Class FilmGuiViewer

java.lang.Object
  FilmGuiViewer

public class FilmGuiViewer
extends java.lang.Object

Class containing executable frames with user choice buttons. Eventually leads to film trailer after various quiz questions.

Version:
(13 April 2015)
Author:
(ikbiel)

Nested Class Summary
 class FilmGuiViewer.ClickListener
          Inner class of FilmGuiViewer that waits for user to click a button and generates event specific to the button pushed.
 
Constructor Summary
FilmGuiViewer()
          Constructor for FilmGuiViewer Constructs starting frame with panel, title label, and start button Constructs ClickListener object to work with buttons when clicked

          Method adds first frame after opening frame containing 'scenery' choice JButtons.

          Method returns FilmGuiViewer instance variable of UserChoices array containing all JButton and URL pairings to film trailer.
